input.command: echo "=== FINAL VERIFICATION SUMMARY ===" && echo "" && echo "FILE COUNT:" && find docs -name "*.md" -type f | wc -l && echo "" && echo "TOTAL LINES:" && (wc -l .claude/CLAUDE.md; find docs -name "*.md" -type f -exec wc -l {} +) 2>/dev/null | grep "total" | awk '{sum+=$1} END {print sum+86 " (including CLAUDE.md)"}'
